# module.exports

<dl>
<dt> Instance of </dt><dd markdown="1">
 [`Object`]({{site.baseurl}}\built-ins\Object)

### Description

The directory name of current source file.

### Example

```js
console.writeLine(module.path);
```

### Properties

- `help`
- `makeDocs`
- `testAllExamples`
